alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 12:22PM EDT until August 12 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Northern Hancock County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1221 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McComb, or near Findlay, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Findlay, Fostoria, North Baltimore, McComb, Arcadia, Van Buren, Pemberville, Bradner, Wayne, Bloomdale, Risingsun, Cygnet, Jerry City, Benton Ridge, West Millgrove and Bairdstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
